scripts.docker:build: pnpm run web build && docker build -t templates2 .
scripts.docker:start: docker run -e USERNAME=user -e PASSWORD=pass -e DOMAIN=example.com -e INSECURE=true --rm -it -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock templates2 node dist/init.js
scripts.docker: pnpm run docker:build && pnpm run docker:start
